in August this Chinese fighter jet
intercepted a US surveillance plane in

China Sea repeatedly buzzing the US
plane and closing to within 30 feet last
year in the same area two Chinese and US
Navy ships came close to colliding China
says this sea is its territory and it
wants other navies and air forces to
keep out that's not something the US
Navy is about to accept when we talk
about our capabilities learn about our
capabilities to operate in a generally
unrestricted way in the waters of our
choice and as some countries have
increasingly complex anti-access or
area-denial weapons we have to develop
our tactics techniques and procedures to
continue to operate in an unfettered
manner in other words China's ambitions
to dominate this region will not go
unchallenged
the US Navy will continue to sail its
carriers through the East and South
